description: This file defines a Flutter widget called MenuPage that presents a menu browsing interface with filters, search functionality, and a grid of menu item cards. It also includes a search delegate for handling search input.

classes.name: MenuPage
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a menu with filtering, searching, and grid layout functionalities.

classes.name: _MenuSearchDelegate
classes.description: A SearchDelegate implementation for handling search interactions within MenuPage.

methods.name: searchAction
methods.description: Static method to trigger the search interface and handle search queries.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the menu page, including headers, search bar, featured items, and a grid of menu items.

methods.name: buildActions
methods.description: Creates action buttons for the search interface, such as clear.

methods.name: buildLeading
methods.description: Creates the leading widget for the search interface, like a back button.

methods.name: buildResults
methods.description: Handles displaying search results, triggers search on the provider.

methods.name: buildSuggestions
methods.description: Handles search suggestions, also triggers search query updates.
